snippet: Two additional artists -- Barbara Kruger and Catherine Opie -- have resigned from the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles, only a few days after the resignation of the artist John Baldessari raised new questions about the museum's...
abstract: Two additional artists -- Barbara Kruger and Catherine Opie -- have resigned from the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles, only a few days after the resignation of the artist John Baldessari raised new questions about the museum's direction.

headline.main: Two More Artists Quit the Board of  MoCA in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: More Artists Quit Board Of Los Angeles Museum

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art
